title: Miss Fortune
description: Caleb Morrison is the most uptight man I’ve ever met – and he’s my new boss.One moment he’s cold, the next he’s unexpectedly sweet. It’s enough to give me whiplash. Despite my attraction to him, I’m convinced we’re too different to be more than friends.But then he flips the script and I’m left with a decision.Daisy Wilson is the most intriguing woman I’ve ever met – and she’s my new assistant.Although we’re complete opposites, I can’t resist her positive energy or the light she brings to my life.But just as we’re growing closer, my secret threatens everything.Pushing her away is the right thing to do.I just hope she doesn’t listen.Full Length Standalone book with no cliffhanger. Fifth book of the “Miss Series”.***Miss Fortune is for mature audiences due to steamy bedroom scenes that are in no way contained to just the bedroom.***
author: Aubrey Bondurant
